The foundation for a GG Minecraft provider.

GG Servers

Minecraft and Game Server Hosting

I was excited to work with the guys over at GG Servers again. This time around they were looking for a more modern and simpler website but keeping a similar look to their existing website. I cleaned up the website, switched to more modern coding and image standards that support retina, modernized their order page, and overall just made a great website that holds true to their existing brand!
